root.name: Voltron: Defender of the Universe
root.description: OverviewVoltron: Defender of the Universe is an action game developed by Behaviour Interactive and published by THQ for the PlayStation 3 (on November 29, 2011 via PlayStation Network) and Xbox 360 (on November 30, 2011 via Xbox Live Arcade). Based on the 1984-1985 Voltron: Defender of the Universe animated series.GameplayVoltron is primarily a dual-joystick shooter where players control one of the five Lion Force Voltron pilots (either piloting their giant robot lions or battling on-foot when their robots lose their health). There are also shoot 'em up (or shmup) levels, along with bonus boss battle sections focused on co-operative turn-based combat and quick time events.DelistedVoltron: Defender of the Universe was removed from both Xbox Live Arcade and Playstation Network only a year after its release. Though no official statement was released, it no doubt had to do with publisher THQ's bankruptcy preventing them from renewing the license with World Events Productions.
